column1: 說　　明： 1.本表不含歇業廠商資料。
2.本表資料83年5月以前不包括金門縣及連江縣。
column6: 2.Data series for May 1994 and before exclude Kinmen County and Lienchiang County.

column1: 3.自88年1月起，因「勞動基準法」擴大適用範圍，適用勞基法之事業單位家數增加，致家數提存率下降。
column6: 3.The regulatory scope of the Labor Standards Act" (LSA) was expanded in January 1999. As a result

column1: 4.99年以前，家數提存率之計算方式為提存戶數占適用勞動基準法之事業單位家數比率；99年起，修正家數
column6: entities regulated by LSA increased, resulting in a decreased rate of appropriating accounts.

column1: 提存率之計算方式為提存戶數占有提撥勞工退休金義務之事業單位家數比率，致家數提存率上升。
column6: 4.Before July 2010, the rate of appropriating accounts was calculated according to the ratio of appropriating accounts to the
number of business entities to which the Labor Standards Act applied. After the revision in July 2010, the ratio of appropriating
accounts is to the number of business entities required by law to appropriate for labor pensions on a regular basis. As a
consequence, the rate of appropriating accounts has gone up.
